text:
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is ELEPHANT.
<ROUND i="1 of 2">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
CHICKEN: Let's try to cooperate!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 2.2×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="80" multiplied_contrib="176.0" active_players="6" redistributed_each="29.3"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> WALRUS=10,CHICKEN=20,PARROT=10,OWL=10,CHICK=20 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 4 coins to give a reward of 3.0 coins. Choose whom to reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<REWARD> {"WALRUS":1,"CHICKEN":1} </REWARD>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"ELEPHANT (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_reward":8,"coins_rewarded_to_you":0,"payoff":31}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 2">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PARROT: Let's continue cooperating!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 2.2×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="80" multiplied_contrib="176.0" active_players="6" redistributed_each="29.3"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> WALRUS=10,CHICKEN=20,PARROT=10,OWL=10,CHICK=20 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 4 coins to give a reward of 3.0 coins. Choose whom to reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<REWARD> {} </REWARD>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"ELEPHANT (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_reward":0,"coins_rewarded_to_you":0,"payoff":39}}'/>
</ROUND>
